180518
the last 5-6 weeks¬†was involved in several complex projects simultaneity with quite sophisticated tasks. Now a real relief to create something simple and ruff..just fi di fun. hope I‚Äôm not the only one having a good time right now. this last summer before the great war is going to be magical!

posts.title: Falcon Heavy Test Flight
posts.body: holy..it was just perfect..even had to cry dunno why. I feel like the greatest age of human history is just before us, no matter what other signs might suggest¬†¬†
